name: WOW!Q
author: AustraliaWOW!

sections.description: Popup questionnaires linked back into a CRM in JUST a few clicks? Yup.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/wow directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress
  3. Use the Settings->WOW!Q screen to configure the plugin
sections.changelog:
1.4.1

  • Fixed font issues in the GDPR popup

  • Fixed CSS class conflicts

  • Separate Questionnaires from GDPR request form

  • Added Email column for exporting data from GDPR Preference Page
  • Fixed issue when removing user data from GDPR Preference Page
  • Fixed phone field layout width.

1.3.8

  • Added WooCommerce Product based on the user’s score percentage

1.3.6

  • Rework GDPR data removal flow
  • Added notification for already opt-out data
  • Fixed Pixel firing for questionnaires

1.3.5

  • Fixed email bug

1.3.4

1.3.2

  • Fixed minor css layout issue

1.3.1

  • Added Branching feature

1.3.0
